name: Risky treasure
description:
Enter the unstable cave to get the treasure! surely nothing will go wrong...
-----
Credits:
Font- "A Goblin Appears!" by Chequered Ink [ https://www.dafont.com/a-goblin-appears.font ]

Art and programming- me

-----

how to play:

ad to move

w to jump (you have a double jump!)

f in the intro scene to full screen
